workshop.banner_dis: Unlock Your Potential with Our Upcoming Events

workshop_list.workshop_agenda: Welcome to our New Relic Game Day event! Here we will be providing you insights of understanding complex systems. Following that, we have a hands-on workshop, where you’ll explore Full Stack Observability. Lastly, don’t miss our observability challenge, where you’ll apply your new found skills to tackle real-world scenarios and optimize your system’s performance.

workshop_highlights.highlights_key: Welcome & Introduction: Get to know our team and fellow New Relic enthusiasts
New Relic Overview: Dive into the latest features and updates from New Relic.
Real-World Scenarios: Learn how other customers are leveraging New Relic for success
Q&A and Networking: Connect with experts and fellow attendees for valuable insights

speakers_list.speaker_profile: Technical Account Manager, New Relic, Inc.
Senior Developer Relations Engineer, New Relic, Inc.

workshop_list.workshop_name: Terraform CI/CD with Azure DevOps using Best Practices
